snippet: The Fed’s monthly survey of business activity showed some economic benefits from the steep drop in oil prices, but it warned of the building negative effects on energy companies.
abstract: Federal Reserve issues beige book report that finds signs of moderate or modest economic growth in 12 regional banking districts in December 2014 and first part of January 2015; Fed warns that low gasoline prices are beginning to affect some industries.
lead_paragraph: The Fed’s monthly survey of business activity showed some economic benefits from the steep drop in oil prices, but it warned of the building negative effects on energy companies.

headline.main: Fed’s Beige Book Survey Finds Modest Economic Growth
headline.print_headline: Fed Report Finds Modest Gains in Rate of Economic Growth
